entries.title: Brazil in chaos: How Bolsonaro's supporters pushed their country to the brink
entries.description: Political tensions in Brazil came to a boiling point on Sunday after hundreds of far-right protesters stormed government buildings in protest of the swearing-in of President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva.

entries.title: Biden condemns violence in Brazil as 'assault on democracy'
entries.description: President Joe Biden condemned the political unrest that emerged in Brazil over the weekend after supporters of far-right former President Jair Bolsonaro stormed the country’s major government buildings, denouncing the attack as an “assault on democracy.”
